name: Metro Warp
description: Metro Warp is a 3D puzzle game about guiding oblivious pedestrians who can only turn left. Place obstacles in front of these predictable commuters, and help them find the exits in 50 mind-melting floating worlds, where up is down and down is sideways.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Fun puzle game with a literal twist.
Even though i just got the game i love it and would play longer periods of time if i didnt frustrate myself. xD
